setDetails.setDescription:
DII is the index of Ethereum based DAO tokens and Ethereum Infrastructure tokens. DII tokens will have some connections with a DAO we are planning to build called Healthy DAO.

The DII tokens holders will have some prime rights in Healthy DAO.

Healthy DAO is a DAO making the people in crypto and web3 world healthier.
We hope DAOâ€™s work can be easier, so we also create DAO tools and other Ethereum based infrastructure tools.

Let us build and invest our own future!

Methodology
The DII is meant to track Ethereum based DAO tokens(4) and Ethereum Infrastructure tokens(2) and Ethereum.
1. Scope: The index includes the 7 investable assets with real usage and large capitalizations around the theme of Ethereum: Wrapped ETH(WETH), ConstitutionDAO(PEOPLE), Ethereum Name Service(ENS), Bankless DAO(BANK), Immutable X(IMX), Friends With Benefied(FWB), Babylon Finance(BABL).
2. Weighting: Ethereum 20%, Ethereum based DAO tokens 50%, Ethereum Infrastructure tokens 30%.
3. Rebalancing: 3 months once (The first Friday).

The composition is:
- 20% WETH
- 15% PEOPLE
- 15% BANK
- 10% WFB
- 10% BABL
- 15% ENS
- 15% IMX

The underlying index is rebalanced after the close of trading on the first Friday of each calendar 3 months. The Fund is rebalanced in accordance with its Underlying Index.

Component Selection

Market requirements
- The components must show signs of heavy usage on Ethereum

Infrastructure.
- The components must show signs of heavy usage on DAO governance.
- The assets must have sufficient liquidity for initial inclusion and rebalances.

Technical requirements
- Available on Ethereum blockchain
- Trust-minimized assets
- The token must not be considered a security by the corresponding authorities across different jurisdictions.

Safety Requirements
- Any network/protocol must have conducted sufficient security audits and/or security professionals must have reviewed the protocol to determine that security best practices have been followed.

Index Maintenance
DII is maintained 3 months once in two phases:

Determination Phase
The determination phase takes place during the fourth week of the month. It is the phase when the changes needed for the next reconstitution are determined.

Reconstitution Phase
Following publication of the determination phase outcome, the index composition will change to the new weights on the first friday of the following month. I.e components will be added or removed.
setDetails.managerDescription: Fund Manager | Crypto trader | FX trader | solidity javascript programmer | lawyer | co-founder of Healthy DAO
